Logout.title: Logout
Logout.steps: You can logout using the button below. Doing so will end your current session.
Logout.impact: You'll need to login again next time you want to access your account. But in the meantime your account will be protected from access by anyone else with access to this device.

Hero.stopWorrying: Stop worrying how long since you last remembered to check. Start hearing about new documents as soon as they're filed.
